145, 110, 250, 50, 290, 600, 48, 95, 40], }, }; export default function DashboardPage() { const categories = mainData.map((d) => d.Year); const totalBudgetSeries = mainData.map((d) => ({ y: d.TotalBudget, drilldown: d.Year, })); // Prepare drilldown series grouped by year with resource and capital budgets as separate series const drilldownSeriesGrouped = []; Object.entries(drilldownData).forEach(([year, data]) => { drilldownSeriesGrouped.push({ id: year, name: `Resource Budget for ${year}`, type: "bar", data: data.resource.map((val, i) => [data.categories[i], val]), color: "#7cb5ec", showInLegend: true, }); drilldownSeriesGrouped.push({ id: year, name: `Capital Budget for ${year}`, type: "bar", data: data.capital.map((val, i) => [data.categories[i], val]), color: "#434348", showInLegend: true, }); }); const options = { chart: { type: "line", height: 550, }, title: { text: "Total Budget Over Years (£M) - Click points for details", }, xAxis: { categories, title: { text: "Year" }, }, yAxis: { min: 0, title: { text: "Budget (£M)" }, labels: { formatter() { return `£${this.value}M`; }, }, }, tooltip: { shared: true, valuePrefix: "£", valueSuffix: "M", }, plotOptions: { series: { cursor: "pointer", marker: { enabled: true, }, }, bar: { grouping: true, }, }, legend: { enabled: true, }, series: [ { name: "Total Budget", data: totalBudgetSeries, color: "#007bff", }, ], drilldown: { series: drilldownSeriesGrouped, }, }; return (

Click on a year point in the line chart to see departmental Resource and Capital budget breakdowns.

Resource Budget bars are blue; Capital Budget bars are dark gray.

); }
